Fostering a Diverse, Equitable and Inclusive Work Environment 
Recruitment
Global Internship Program 
Also in 2021, ACI’s Human Resources team began planning an expansion of our 
current regional internship programs. The goal is to globally drive internships 
that offer opportunities for more students from diverse backgrounds to gain 
exposure and understanding of the payments software business. Once they 
graduate, high-performing interns will be considered for job openings to 
launch their full-time careers in the payments industry. Our current internship 
programs in Limerick, Ireland; Bangalore, India and Bogota, Colombia will be 
used as models.
